block.p: A selective listing of state, county and local government events across Connecticut this week. (All dates and times subject to confirmation.) Items should be submitted by mail at least three weeks in advance to the Connecticut Op-Ed Page, The New York Times, 229 West 43rd Street, New York, N.Y. 10036, or by e-mail to ctcivic@nytimes.com.
STATE OF CONNECTICUT
Hartford Citizen's Ethics Advisory Board. Thursday at 2:30 p.m. Conference Room 2A, 18-20 Trinity Street. (860) 566-4472.
FAIRFIELD COUNTY
Danbury Planning Commission. Wednesday at 7:30 p.m. Danbury City Hall, 155 Deer Hill Avenue. (203) 797-4500.
Redding Zoning Board of Appeals. Tuesday at 8 p.m. Redding Town Hall, 100 Hill Road. (203) 938-2002.
Trumbull Economic Development Commission. Thursday at 7:15 p.m. Trumbull Town Hall, 5866 Main Street. (203) 452-5000.
Weston Commission for Children and Youth. Tuesday at 5:30 p.m. Weston Town Hall, 56 Norfield Road. (203) 222-2656.
Wilton Board of Selectmen. Monday at 7:30 p.m. Wilton Town Hall, 238 Danbury Road. (203) 563-0100.
HARTFORD COUNTY
Avon Planning and Zoning Commission. Tuesday at 7:30 p.m. Avon Town Hall, 60 West Main Street. (860) 409-4300.
Marlborough Economic Development Commission. Wednesday at 7 p.m. Marlborough Town Hall, 26 North Main Street. (860) 295-6200.
Marlborough Park and Recreation Commission. Tuesday at 7 p.m. Marlborough Town Hall, 26 North Main Street. (860) 295-6200.
Simsbury Aging and Disability Commission. Tuesday at 7 p.m. Simsbury City Hall, 933 Hopmeadow Street. (860) 658-3200.
LITCHFIELD COUNTY
Barkhamsted Board of Finance. Tuesday at 7 p.m. Barkhamsted Town Hall, 67 Ripley Hill Road. (860) 379-8285.
Bridgewater Inland Wetlands Commission. Tuesday at 7:30 p.m. Bridgewater Town Hall, 46 Main Street South. (860) 354-5150.
Bridgewater Registrar of Voters. Wednesday at 5 p.m. Bridgewater Town Hall, 46 Main Street South. (860) 354-5150.
Cornwall Board of Selectmen. Tuesday at 7:30 p.m. Cornwall Town Hall, 26 Pine Street. (860) 672-2709.
Norfolk Norfolk Sewer District. Wednesday at 7:30 p.m. Norfolk Town Hall, 19 Maple Avenue. (860) 542-5679.
Plymouth Board of Finance. Thursday at 7 p.m. Plymouth Town Hall, 80 Main Street. (860) 585-4001.
Roxbury Board of Finance. Tuesday at 7 p.m. Roxbury Town Hall, 29 North Street. (860) 354-9938.
Washington Historic District Commission. Monday at 7:30 p.m. Washington Town Hall, 2 Bryan Plaza. (860) 868-2259.
Woodbury Planning Commission. Wednesday at 7:30 p.m. Shove Building, 281 Main Street South. (203) 263-2144.
MIDDLESEX COUNTY
Chester Board of Selectmen. Tuesday at 8 a.m. Chester Town Hall, 203 Middlesex Avenue. (860) 526-0013.
Essex Zoning Commission. Monday at 7 p.m. Essex Town Hall, 29 West Avenue. (860) 767-4340.
NEW HAVEN COUNTY
Cheshire Historic District Commission. Monday at 7 p.m. Cheshire Town Hall, 84 South Main Street. (203) 271-6660.
Madison Planning and Zoning Commission. Thursday at 7:30 a.m. Madison Town Campus, 8 Campus Drive. (203) 245-5672.
Orange Town Plan and Zoning Commission. Tuesday at 7:30 p.m. Orange Town Hall, 617 Orange Center Road. (203) 891-2122.
Woodbridge Industrial and Development Commission. Tuesday at 7:30 p.m. Woodbridge Town Hall, 11 Meeting House Lane. (203) 389-3400.
NEW LONDON COUNTY
Lebanon Planning and Zoning Commission. Monday at 7:30 p.m. Lebanon Town Hall, 579 Exeter Road. (860) 642-7319.
Lebanon Zoning Board of Appeals. Thursday at 7:30 p.m. Lebanon Town Hall, 579 Exeter Road. (860) 642-7319.
Montville Economic Development Commission. Monday at 7 p.m. Montville Town Hall, 310 Norwich-New London Turnpike. (860) 848-3030, ext. 311.
TOLLAND COUNTY
Andover Zoning Board of Appeals. Wednesday at 7:30 p.m. Old Firehouse, Center Street. (860) 742-7305.
Tolland Inland Wetlands Commission. Thursday at 7 p.m. Hicks Memorial Municipal Building, 21 Tolland Green. (860) 871-3600.
Tolland Water Pollution Control Authority. Tuesday at 7 p.m. Hicks Memorial Municipal Building, 21 Tolland Green. (860) 871-3600.
WINDHAM COUNTY
Danielson Water Pollution Control Authority. Wednesday at 6 p.m. Killingly Town Hall, 172 Main Street. (860) 779-5300.

Putnam Zoning Commission. Wednesday at 7 p.m. Putnam Town Hall, 126 Church Street. (860) 963-6807. Woodstock Board of Selectmen. Thursday at 7:30 p.m. Woodstock Town Hall, 415 Route 169. (860) 928-6595.
